summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Candidate Portal feature. All 15 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing verified all features working correctly: Registration form with all fields, Login authentication, Token-based protected routes, Dashboard with interview stats, and Interview slot booking flow.
critical_code_review_comments: All Candidate Portal features implemented correctly
Registration form includes all required fields (Name, Email, Password, Phone) and optional fields (LinkedIn URL, Current Company, Experience Years)
JWT token-based authentication working correctly with separate 'candidate_portal' token type
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Dashboard correctly shows interview stats (Pending Action, Upcoming, Completed)
Interview slot booking flow works end-to-end with modal selection and status update
Logout properly clears token and redirects to login
seed_data_creation: Created test candidate (cand_967756a5) with email test.candidate@example.com linked to candidate portal user. Created interview (int_5203532b1cc2) with 3 proposed slots for testing slot booking.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Candidate Portal fully tested. Test candidate 'test.candidate@example.com' has booked interview slot for Tuesday, January 27, 2026 at 4:30 AM. Interview status changed from 'Awaiting Candidate Confirmation' to 'Confirmed'. All CRUD operations for candidate portal users working correctly.

backend_api_tests.POST /api/candidate-portal/register: PASS - Creates candidate with all fields (required + optional)
backend_api_tests.POST /api/candidate-portal/register (min: PASS - Works with only required fields
backend_api_tests.POST /api/candidate-portal/register (mis: PASS - Returns 422 for missing required field
backend_api_tests.POST /api/candidate-portal/login: PASS - Returns JWT token and candidate data

frontend_tests.Login Page Load: PASS - Shows email, password fields and Sign In button
frontend_tests.Registration Form Toggle: PASS - Switches to Create Account mode with all fields
frontend_tests.Registration Form Fields: PASS - Name, Phone, Email, Password (required), LinkedIn, Company, Experience (optional)
frontend_tests.Registration Flow: PASS - Creates account and shows success toast
frontend_tests.Login Flow: PASS - Authenticates and redirects to dashboard
frontend_tests.Protected Route: PASS - Dashboard redirects to login when not authenticated
frontend_tests.Dashboard Stats: PASS - Shows Pending Action, Upcoming, Completed counts
frontend_tests.Interview Card Display: PASS - Shows company name, job title, mode, duration
frontend_tests.Slot Selection Modal: PASS - Opens with available slots on Select Slot click
frontend_tests.Slot Booking: PASS - Books slot and updates interview status to Confirmed
frontend_tests.Upcoming Interview Display: PASS - Shows scheduled time and Join Meeting link
frontend_tests.Logout: PASS - Clears token and redirects to login
